text: Save the Tiger is a 1973 American drama movie directed by John G. Avildsen and screenplay by Steve Shagan from his novel of the same name. It stars Jack Lemmon, Jack Gilford, Laurie Heineman, Norman Burton, Harvey Jason and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won one Oscar for Lemmon at the Academy Awards in 1974. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about tigers Category:Movies about animal rights Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John G. Avildsen
title: Save the Tiger
